description.p: Class for uploading data using SFTP (FTP over SSH). For FTP or FTPS(FTP over SSL) use INET::FTP

property.name: CallResult
property.description: The result of the last call to a method on the SFTP class.

property.name: ServerHost
property.description: Default = "localhost". The location of the SFTP server.

property.name: ServerPort
property.description: Default = 22. The port over which to establish the secure connection.

property.name: ServerConnectTimeoutInMilliseconds
property.description: Default = -1 (meaning default). The number of milliseconds to wait for a new connection before giving up.

property.name: SecurityMethod
property.description: Default = INET::SSHSecurityMethod::Password. The security method to use when connecting to the server (Password, KeyInMemory, KeyInFile).

property.name: UserName
property.description: The user name to use when the security method selected is INET::SSHSecurityMethod::Password.

property.name: Password
property.description: The password name to use when the security method selected is INET::SSHSecurityMethod::Password. Be sure to protect the password and to set it from code rather than embedding it as a constant.

property.name: PublicKey
property.description: When INET::SSHSecurityMethod is set to INET::SSHSecurityMethod::KeyInMemory this value is to be set to the Base64 value of the public key. When INET::SSHSecurityMethod is set to INET::SSHSecurityMethod::KeyInFile, this value is to be set to the full path of a file containing the public key.

property.name: PrivateKey
property.description: When INET::SSHSecurityMethod is set to INET::SSHSecurityMethod::KeyInMemory this value is to be set to the Base64 value of the private key. When INET::SSHSecurityMethod is set to INET::SSHSecurityMethod::KeyInFile, this value is to be set to the full path of a file containing the private key.

property.name: PrivateKeyPassword
property.description: When INET::SSHSecurityMethod is set to INET::SSHSecurityMethod::KeyInMemory, or INET::SSHSecurityMethod::KeyInFile this value is to be set to the password (if any) assigned to the private key.

property.name: EnableTrace
property.description: Default = *[xb:.t.]*. If set to .t., Enables tracing for the SFTP object.

property.name: BufferSize
property.description: Default = 32768. The buffer size to use in transferring files. Performance can be improved on large file transfers by increasing the size of this buffer. Setting the property is optional.

page.example:
' Example SFTP session in the Interactive Window dim sftp as inet::sftp sftp.ServerHost = "ftp.myserver.com" sftp.SecurityMethod = inet::SSHSecurityMethod::Password sftp.UserName = "<user> " sftp.Password = "<pwd>"
' Listing dim Listing as C ?sftp.ListDirectory(Listing,"/downloads") = .T.
?listing
?sftp.SendFile("c:\temp\SFTPTest.txt", "/downloads/SFTPTest.txt") = .T.
?sftp.ReceiveFile("/downloads/SFTPTest.txt", "c:\temp\SFTPTest.txt") = .T.
?sftp.DeleteFile("/downloads/SFTPTest.txt") = .T.
